title: How soon the problem with nodes will be solved?
body:
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/7387
The commit got into the master 10 days ago, but it doesn't seem to be in the dotnet master, because I still have to open visual studio with special parameters:
```
From a developer command prompt:
set MSBUILDDISABLENODE = 1
```

nodes.body: That PR should ship with Visual Studio 17.3, starting in the next released preview, which will be released soon.
